SENT.plain: Eight members of a 3-generation kindred of Indian descent with congenital contractural arachnodactyly (Beals syndrome) have been appraised
Considerable variation was noted in the clinical features of affected persons, and the previously unreported associated finding of clubbing of the fingers and toes was evident in two individuals
The family was investigated using conventional serum and protein markers, and RFLP probes for type I and II collagen
No linkage in affected members could be demonstrated with type I collagen probes
